subject: Rule annotation
msgSnippet: I m looking at the new Rule annotation in JUnit4. It s pretty nice, but it doesn t seem to inherit. That is if I have a super class that has the @Rule, sub
messageBody:
I'm looking at the new Rule annotation in JUnit4. It's pretty nice, but it doesn't seem to inherit.

That is if I have a super class that has the @Rule, sub class tests don't run the rule on its tests.

Combined with the requirement that the rules field be public, this is surprising.

The practical effect for me is that it can't really replace my custom runner, as the @RunWith annotation is inherited by subclasses.

Am I missing something?

Yishai.
